name: NEOWIZ MUSIC CAFE
info:
• 别名: Pantavision（曾）
  • 别名: NEOWIZ MUCA
  • 生日: 2012年04月26日
  • 引用来源: https://muca.world/
  • 地址: NEOWIZ PANGYO TOWER, 14, Daewangpangyo-ro 645beon-gil, Bundang-gu, Seongnam-si, Gyeonggi-do, 13487, Korea
  • Soundcloud: neowiz_ic_sound
  • Twitter: @NEOWIZMUCA
  • Youtube: NEOWIZ MUCA
  • Facebook: NEOWIZMusicCafe
detail:
Neowiz MUCA主要成员来自前Pantavision，而Pantavision经集团转入Neowiz mobile后注销，仅由Neowiz留存原Pantavision公司商标。（Neowiz历史请见另外两个Neowiz词条 by 喵鱼）

        Neowiz MUCA主要负责Neowiz公司2011年以后的节奏游戏开发。诸如TapSonic、较新的DJMax系列。

---
Resonance by Music
Beyond rhythm game itself
There are many brilliant artists at MUCA

Most of all, MUCA shows great respect to all artists creating music, and we are searching for talented artists who want to join us.

Be a part of MUCA now.
Let the fans from all over the world enjoy your music.
---

2012.04        NEOWIZ MOBILE Corp. and mobile division of PENTAVISION Corp. underwent a merger and combined into NEOWIZ MOBILE Corp.
